alert.note: Alert for Calumet; Manitowoc; Winnebago (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 19 at 8:26AM CST until January 19 at 12:00PM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...SNOW DIMINISHING FROM SOUTH TO NORTH TODAY... .A Low pressure system centered over northwest Illinois this morning will track to central Lower Michigan by mid-afternoon. The primary snow band with the storm was over northern Wisconsin at 800 am, and will shift into Upper Michigan during the mid to late morning. Lighter snow as well as some drizzle and freezing drizzle will continue in the wake of the main snow band. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...Snow and drizzle. Less than an inch of additional snow accumulation expected. * WHERE...Calumet, Manitowoc, and Winnebago Counties. * WHEN...Until Noon CST today. * IMPACTS...Hazardous travel conditions are expected.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
